questions.question: What does a red traffic light signal mean?
questions.explanation: A red light means that you must come to a complete stop at the stop line.

questions.question: What does a yellow diamond-shaped sign indicate?
questions.explanation: Yellow diamond signs are used to warn drivers about upcoming road conditions and hazards.

questions.question: When are you allowed to pass a school bus in Montana?
options: When the red lights are flashing
When the bus driver signals you to pass
questions.explanation: It is illegal to pass a school bus that is stopped to load or unload children.

questions.question: What is the maximum speed limit on an urban freeway in Montana?
questions.explanation: The maximum speed limit on an urban freeway in Montana is 65 mph.

questions.question: Where should you park if your vehicle breaks down on a highway?
options: In the middle of the road
On the shoulder of the road
questions.correctAnswer: On the shoulder of the road
questions.explanation: If your vehicle breaks down on a highway, you should park on the shoulder of the road as far away from traffic as possible.

questions.question: What should you do when driving in foggy conditions?
questions.explanation: In foggy conditions, use your low beam headlights because high beams will reflect off the fog and make it harder to see.

questions.question: Who has the right-of-way at a four-way stop?
options: The vehicle that is moving fastest
questions.explanation: At a four-way stop, the vehicle that arrived first has the right-of-way. If two vehicles arrive at the same time, the one on the right has the right-of-way.

questions.question: What does a flashing yellow light signal mean?
options: The light is about to turn red
The light is about to turn green
questions.explanation: A flashing yellow light means you should slow down and proceed with caution.

questions.question: What should you do if you approach a pedestrian crosswalk while driving?
options: Slow down or stop if necessary
questions.correctAnswer: Slow down or stop if necessary
questions.explanation: You must slow down or stop if necessary when approaching a pedestrian crosswalk to allow pedestrians to cross the road safely.

questions.question: What should you do if your car starts to skid on a wet road?
options: Brake hard and steer in the opposite direction of the skid
Accelerate and steer in the same direction of the skid
Ease off the accelerator and steer in the direction you want to go
Stop steering and let the car correct itself
questions.correctAnswer: Ease off the accelerator and steer in the direction you want to go
questions.explanation: If your car starts to skid, you should ease off the accelerator and steer in the direction you want to go to regain control.
